imdb.title: Sureiyâzu
imdb.plot: The adventures of a teenage sorceress and her companions as they quest for gold and glory (especially gold).

episodes.title: New comer?: Aratanaru tabidachi!
episodes.plot: While looking for clues that could point to the Hellmaster's Jar, Lina finds herself at odds with a living suit of armor that seems to have a very familiar - and annoying - personality.

episodes.title: Raider!: Yami kara no koe!
episodes.plot: Nama leads the group into a tower where she believes the Hellmaster's Jar can be found! The crumbling halls are full of traps - but the greatest danger to Lina's gang is the diabolical duo waiting in the shadows!

episodes.title: Hurry up: Tsukkome! Iya, Tsukkomuna?
episodes.plot: Lina's crew navigates a fortress full of traps set by Wizer. When a far more powerful adversary is revealed to be pulling the Inspector's strings, Lina employs an odd strategy that surprises everyone!

episodes.title: Keep out: Shinobiyoru majû
episodes.plot: Duclis unleashes the Zanaffar on those who failed the people of Taforashia during their darkest time! But even as the gang vows to fight alongside Pokota, time is running out for the beast's next target!

episodes.title: Majestic? Hoist Sails for the Journey!
episodes.plot: After a Golden Dragon attack pushes them into the sea, Lina and the crew inadvertently destroy the harbor. With no way to return to land, the gang begins a journey!

episodes.title: Doubtful? A Letter from Home!
episodes.plot: When Lina's crew lands in search of food, Filia gives Inverse a letter from her sister and reveals that the gang has been chosen for an important mission.

episodes.title: Where'd That Arrogant Guy Go?
episodes.plot: In a land where the citizens are mystified by their amazing magic, Lina's gang encounters Xellos - and a powerful new enemy!

episodes.title: On the Move! He's Out for Revenge?
episodes.plot: Valgaav is out for revenge, as well as Gourry's Sword of Light! When the villain retreats, Xellos warns that Inverse's magic might not be enough to stop him!

episodes.title: A Wild Rumor! You Can't Have Smoke Without Fire?
episodes.plot: Filia encounters trouble in a town where her kind is not allowed. When Lina's gang rushes to help her, Xellos's insults unleash Filia's anger, and the whole town pays the price!

episodes.title: Wandering Around? The Runaway Shrine Takes a Trip!
episodes.plot: As the gang nears the Fire Dragon temple, they find they can't use their magic! To get their powers back, Inverse unleashes the Dragon Slave - and as usual, does more harm than good.

episodes.title: A Peace Conference? This Is the Dragon Shrine?
episodes.plot: After Lina rebuilds the castle, the Golden Dragons confess their doubts in her ability to complete the important mission. She better not let it bother her - Almayce is about to attack!

episodes.title: Be Careful! The Plan Has Begun!
episodes.plot: Almayce reveals his intentions for the Sword of Light. When Valgaav moves to attack, Filia unseals Lina's magic and a battle erupts!

episodes.title: Continuous Fire! The Wind-Swept Shore of Battle!
episodes.plot: Lina's gang ends up in the middle of a war between two rival nations. Aiding one side in the long-standing conflict could be Inverse's only path to freedom.

episodes.title: Ready for Exile! Isn't Two People's Love Eternal?
episodes.plot: Gravos uses his powerful sword against Lina and the gang, and Inverse must rely on the Dragon Slave. Suddenly, after the island is destroyed, a bridge appears between the two kingdoms!

episodes.title: The Hurdle's Cleared? Jiras' Hidden Power!
episodes.plot: Within a dark castle, a shady guide causes Gourry to become separated from the gang. Possession of the Sword of Light is in the balance - will Jillas finally obtain the power he has sought?

episodes.title: Selfless and Senseless! Pursuit Through the Labyrinth!
episodes.plot: With Jillas on the run, Lina's party must go their separate ways in a twisting labyrinth. They encounter Almayce, Xellos, and Filia, and learn shocking insight into Valgaav's intentions.

episodes.title: An Explosive Situation! The One Who Holds the Key!
episodes.plot: Deep inside his lair, Valgaav confronts Lina, Gourry, Almayce and the others. When the villain gains control of the Sword of Light, he uses his power to transport Inverse's gang far away!

episodes.title: Striding and Swaggering! Lamentation Without End!
episodes.plot: Valgaav is summoning Dark Star, forcing Lina to use her most powerful spells. As the gate between worlds closes, the scene is rocked by a giant explosion!

episodes.title: Disaster and Danger? This Place Is a Wonder Island!
episodes.plot: Lina wanders an unfamiliar land with a pig as her guide. She finds Zelgadis acting strangely and uses her magic to break free from the odd realm - only to discover that Filia might not want to leave!

episodes.title: Pandemonium! Terror of the Cursed Jar!
episodes.plot: Lina, Zelgadis, and Filia take to the sea to locate Gourry. They soon find themselves battling hordes of ghosts in exchange for the chance to claim a rare and powerful jar.

episodes.title: Immediate Results? Love Is in the Tiny Differences!
episodes.plot: Amid sea monsters and cross-dressing, Amelia and Gourry get caught up in the romantic drama of fishy Layla and her human boyfriend.

episodes.title: The Right Person in the Right Place! Amelia in the Village of Justice!
episodes.plot: Gourry and Amelia visit a land with a demon problem, and are tasked with confronting the creatures. Before the battle ends, they find that the "demons" are actually old familiar friends.

episodes.title: Three People, Three Ways! Where the Light Leads!
episodes.plot: Almayce unleashes a horde of monsters to locate the last weapon, and only Lina and the gang can stop their rampage! When they encounter Jillas, he holds a weapon as powerful as Lina's mightiest spell!

episodes.title: A Hero's Advent? To Whom Does the Young Girl Pray?
episodes.plot: In a crumbling village, one of Almayce's underlings takes on Lina's crew - and somehow ends up becoming a hero to the townsfolk!

episodes.title: Savage and Unexplored! History Sealed Away!
episodes.plot: The history of the warring Dragons is revealed! Meanwhile, after Almayce attempts to keep Xellos from forming an alliance that could lead to Dark Star's emergence, the Golden Dragons appear!!

episodes.title: Eternal Death, Final Farewells! A Cry to the Fallen!
episodes.plot: Xellos takes Filia hostage! Lina tries to help, and attacks Almayce with the coveted ultimate weapon - but the powerful bow soon falls in the wrong hands!

episodes.title: No Time for Arguing! Head for the Showdown!
episodes.plot: Hoping to learn how to reclaim his original body, Zelgadis steals the Hellmaster's Jar! He doesn't like what the Red Priest has to say about the matter - but Rezo's words are more torturous to desperate Pokota.

episodes.title: No Way to Guess! The Forbidden Gateway Is Opened!
episodes.plot: Dark Star emerges before the gate can be closed, and Lina and the crew attack with all they've got! Just as the powerful entity seems to be defeated, he escapes - and Valgaav appears!

episodes.title: He Who Emerges from Dark Star!
episodes.plot: Valgaav is unleashed! Filia and Jillas try to stop him, along with Lina's crew. As the powers of darkness reach unbelievable levels, Lina finds the Dragon Slave is worthless!

episodes.title: Try Again! When All Returns to White!
episodes.plot: Just as it seems Valgaav cannot be defeated, Xellos and Filia give Lina the amazing magic power she needs to save the world.

episodes.title: The Sudden Pinch! The Terror of the Monstrous Zoamelgustar!
episodes.plot: Sorceress Princess Amelia accidentally locates a familiar acquaintance, Lina, a teen sorceress who leaves a path of destruction wherever she goes.

episodes.title: The Roguish Priest! His Name is Xellos!
episodes.plot: The Slayer team has reunited. They seek a manuscript that will change a transformed team member back into a human. A lying priest who also wants that manuscript offers his help.

episodes.title: A Wonderful Business! Being a Bodyguard isn't Easy!
episodes.plot: The Slayer team splits up to eat lunch at 2 different restaurants. While there, each group is hired to bodyguard opposing sides in a guild election. This leads to team members unknowingly battling each other.

episodes.title: An Ancient Pledge! One Who Seeks Immortality!
episodes.plot: The Slayer team's employers are captured. The team is trying to figure out how to get the pay they're owed when an immortal and his monster buddy step in.

episodes.title: Staying Behind for the Sake of Love!
episodes.plot: A powerful sorcerer wants to use the life force of the Slayer team to revive his dead love. A monster offers Lina a lunch of steak and immortality.

episodes.title: You Can't Escape! The Return of the Obsessive Martina!
episodes.plot: Princess Martina, having lost everything in a battle with Lina, gets some payback by casting a curse on her.

episodes.title: Sudden Cooking! Follow the Phantom Dragon!
episodes.plot: The Slayer team buys a lunch of delicious Dragon meat. However, the restaurant has none, so secretly uses old Orc meat instead. After discovering the deception, the team goes on a dragon hunt.

episodes.title: Be Eternal! The Day Prince Phil Died?
episodes.plot: Amelia returns home and finds that her father was the target of an assassin.

episodes.title: Hidden Ambitions! The Shocking Confession?
episodes.plot: Amelia's father is surrounded by potential conspirators. The Slayer team suspects that one of them is an assassin.

episodes.title: Voices from the Darkness! Slash 'em to Bits, Ragna Blade!
episodes.plot: Lina can't regain her magical power and gets depressed. Then she notices a signal fire going up in Sayloon kingdom. That's a sign for when something should happen there. In Sayloon, the demon, Kanzel, and others are in the castle to kidnap Phil. Gourry and others try to fight back, but Kanzel's spell pulls them into another dimension and forces them a hard battle. Lina struggles to get to Sayloon. Gourry and others cannot help her from another dimension. Lina tries out the "Talisman," which she bought from Zerros, and increases her magical power just for a moment. She...

episodes.title: The Unexpected End? The Shocking Truth!
episodes.plot: Lina's party gets depressed from having lost Phil to the evils. In the meantime, Christopher, who they thought would be the next king because of what Alfred told them, declares that he won't be the king. Then what was with Alfred's word which told them that Christopher was behind the whole incident? Lina and others go to Alfred's house in the suburb to find out the truth. Having lain in wait for them, Alfred tells them that he was the one who was behind the incident. He did it because he was going to let his father be the king first and then afterwards himself. ...

episodes.title: They're Talking About a Girl Named Zelgadis?!
episodes.plot: Lina's party gets the information that a copy of the Bible is in the country where only women live. Of course, the guys are not allowed to go in, so they get into drags. Zelgadis absolutely hates it. Lina's party meets the daughter of the king, Mivan. She escaped from the country because she was forced to be a princess. Zelgadis relates to her, who's having problem with her status as the daughter of the king, and grows sympathetic feelings for her. Then monsters appear and take her hostage. Lina's party fights a hard battle with the monsters that are made of water. ...

episodes.title: The Stolen Sword of Light! The End of the Demon Dragon King!
episodes.plot: Garp puts Lina's party in a pinch. Then appears the most powerful evil Lord, Fiblizo, who came after the traitor Garp. With his power, he beats Garp easily. He tells Lina's party to come to Saylague for another plan. He leaves, taking Gourry hostage for it.

episodes.title: The Menacing Swordsman! A Journey of Reunion!
episodes.plot: Lina's party gets depressed for having lost Gourry. Silfeel, who fought with them in Saylague, appears, learns of Gourry, and decides to fight with them. On their way to Saylague, they get attacked by a sorcerer with the Sward of Light. His incredible skill puts them in a pinch, but Zangles, who once was their enemy, appears and helps them. With his help, Lina gives the sorcerer a blow. Under his mask appears brain-washed Gourry's face.

episodes.title: Sinister Trap! The Mysterious City of Ghosts!
episodes.plot: Lina's party gets to Saylague to rescue Gourry. Saylague was destroyed by the battle with clone Rezo, but now it's revived as the town of the dead by Fiblizo's magic. Silfeel and others get angry to find out about it. Lina decides to go into Fiblizo's castle by herself because Fiblizo is powerful and she didn't want to get the others involved. Silfeel notices it and forcefully joins her, and also Zangles..

episodes.title: The Souls of the Dead! Lina's Final Decision!
episodes.plot: Lina's party faces Fiblizo, but none of their magic works on him. Fiblizo intends to have Lina use Giga Slay and let it out of control, so he tries to make her exhausted and press her. Zangles and Martina are beaten, Zelgadis and others are confined into crystals. Fiblizo pushes Lina, who's left alone, to use Giga Slay, saying Gourry will die otherwise. The moment the crystal, which Gourry's in, starts cracking, Lina finally uses Giga Slay.

episodes.title: Angry? Lina's Furious Dragon Slave!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Bad! Mirra Otoko wa Shumi Janai!
episodes.plot: Lina and Gourry go to a magic shop in town to sell the treasures that Lina snatched from the bandits. However an item from the booty, a knife, is cursed and it turns the shopkeeper violent and a hullabaloo starts.

episodes.title: Crash! Gekitotsu! Akai no Shiroi no Ayashii no!
episodes.plot: Lina is approached by Zelgadis, who wants one of the mysterious items in her possession. Soon she learns that another mysterious figure wants the same thing.

episodes.title: Dash! Nigero! Mahou ga Tsukaenai?
episodes.plot: Lina and Gourry start investigating a way to stop Shabranigdo's resurrection, however they are plagued with a question. Why is Zelgadis trying to revive the Demon Lord? On the other hand, Rezo cannot easily be trusted.

episodes.title: Escape! Honoo no Hangyojin Noonsa!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?

episodes.title: Focus! Hontou no Teki wa Rezo?
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Give Up Sunzen? Deta Hissatsu no Ken!!
episodes.plot: Under the villains' ceaseless attack, Lina and Zelgadis have no time to rest. Meanwhile, Rezo begins to summon the demons in order to capture them. Outnumbered by the enemies, Lina and Zelgadis get into a pinch.

episodes.title: Help! Shabranigdo Fukkatsu!!
episodes.plot: While taking a rest in a village, Gourry and Zelgadis start fighting over the Philosopher's Stone. Then, they receive a message from Rezo, stating that unless they give the stone to him, he will turn all the villagers into stones.

episodes.title: Impact! Kyoui no Kessen Zen'ya!
episodes.plot: Rezo succeeds in resurrecting the Dark Lord, Shabranigdo. However, Rezo's body is taken over by the Dark Lord which was not part of his plan. All Lina and others can do is to run from the demon, but later they decide to fight back.

episodes.title: Jackpot! Noru ka Soru ka no Oobakuchi!
episodes.plot: Lina and the others challenge the Dark Lord, Shabranigdo. Unfortunately, he is too powerful and no magic works against him. In the final moment, Rezo gets away from the body of Shabranigdo and Lina's Giga Slave smashes the Dark Lord.
